subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Re: new 12-470 and old one? ~ Bruce

Laura,
   
  if they are they grey and white ones(front panel is white on top and grey on bottom with silver buttons and the back panel is all white) then they are the older models of the 470...definately buy them both if you are able to.
   
  Rhonda

lunalamia <rainspirit1@...> wrote:
          Bruce, Yes, I will be checking them out again to make sure. They 
are grey and white, and come in a box that is either white and 
magenta or white and red...
If they are the old, I will get both and give them away for cost only 
to someone that needs one. I'll just wait to find out who in time.
Thanks for the info. 
~ Laura

--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, bruce halliday 
<paranormalinvestigating@...> wrote:
>
> 
> Laura, 
> 
> first make sure they are old model 470's
> they should be white and silver and come packaged in a box not 
> all black with clear plastic packaging.
> 
> If they are the old model 470 definatelly take the two of them.
> there are not only new people but some vets that would want a spare.
> 
> It is a miricle you found any at all. I believed the country was 
picked clean.
> 
> Just don't let the sales man tell you "yes we have them" quite a few
> people called and where assured of what the store had, only to 
travel there and
> find the new model 470. most of the time the sales person will just 
look at the 
> part number and say yes we have them.
> 
> Bruce
> Bruce Halliday 



                           

       
---------------------------------
You rock. That's why Blockbuster's offering you one month of Blockbuster Total Access, No Cost.
